title: REQUEST: Hide MultiSSH text
author: DinamoXP
body_snippet:
Hi,

MultiSSH text is visible as plain text and there is no protection when sending sensitive information (passwords).
My request is to have a check box that when enabled, it will hide the text and text will not be saved in recent commands list.

Thanks

![req](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/97408535/148699411-a19489b8-f220-4523-9476-2286cc60388a.jpg)
